attributes.title: JUST NO❤️
attributes.review: I open the app to see a terrifying photo of a scary looking orange so terrifying I fell down my stairs rolled into the living room then in the kitchen and finally in my back yard were I fell into my pool and started to drown luck ally my mother was there to help me but then my dog saw my phone on the floor and looked at the photo he also got terrified and fell down the stairs but the front door was open... he rolled down the steps and into the street... a car had crashed him, but thank god I have magical powers to bring animals back to life so I brought him back to life. But the story's not over then my sister saw the app open and fainted her head fell in her bowl of soup and she started to drown in A BOWL OF F*CKING SOUP!! I threw her head out of the bowl and slapped her across the face (what a dumba**) and said to her “you dumb b*tch get up, did you forget you have legs” overall this app is horrible DONT GET IT!! ❤️ ( Ig: xo.delani_ ) (TikTok: xo.delani)
why would you even wanna download this???????-100/10🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: the worst experience of a life time. 💯👹👺🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮👺👺🎃🎃
attributes.review: When I opened this app my TV started screaming at the top at the top of its lungs. “If you touch anything else other than the home or delete button I will shatter your phone into zillions of pieces👺” So I was like,” 👁👄🌀” But I continued to go on turns out the TV wasn’t lying and now I’m writing this review on my crusty 72829 year old ceiling fan😽😽😽😽😽😽😽😽😽. Before my phone✨thankfully✨shattered , my eyes bleed more than 🐱 has in my entire 57 years of living.🥴🙊👹🙉 While using the app, I had to witness a disgusting, 🤢🤢moldy,🤮🤮 old, 😡😡ratchet, 🐸🐸ugly, 🎃🎃horrific, clown faced🤡🤡 Cheeto. It was just- scarring if I’m being honest with you. The worst part about this experience was that my sleep paralysis demon saw it as-well. They disintegrated into ✨dust✨ which was surprisingly delicious to eat. But that’s off topic.🥴🙈☺️🤭🤫😉 WORST EXPERIENCE EVER. PERIODT. 🤡🙊👹🐸🎃✨🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢✨🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: HORRIBLe
attributes.review: let me tell u i got it because i love the racist racist homophobic transphobic sexist misogynistic xenophobic man who told us to drink bleach and has over 20 rape allegations like wow and he’s hair the way it just flips back with the wind makes me soooo god it’s just HOT. now his wife if ur reading this :hello🐱 now i think your a beautiful woman who deserves the world and u have that with donald duck unless he destroys it but hey i need to stay positive. *doing this with a weird accent like british or something idk* back to trump god let me tell u love him the way he drinks and talks and insults everyone with no effort what so ever. also did u know that his girlfriend Ivanka that he u know sleep with even through they’re related and she’s his daughter is following aoc in insta! let me tell u even she doesn’t like her own father or at least not as much as me . back to the app: so i opened it and BAM a very small pp appeared on my screen. i would compare it to a carrot since they’re both orange but i like carrots not pps. and in the picture his daughter Ivanka was right next to him barely in clothes! and so that was my very well thought out experience with this horrid app so i say with with the most dignity i can trumpeto 2020🇵🇷🇵🇷🇵🇷🇵🇷🇲🇾🇲🇾🇲🇾🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷 make what a country great cause u tried with american and failed 😘❤️✨

attributes.title: Chinese government scam app
attributes.review: Don’t be fooled this app is most likely created by the Chinese government to watch us all.it even looks at your location. Don’t let them get you. This is even worse for our government than Tick Tock. The Chinese government is trying to slander our president with fake news apps like this.

attributes.title: That disgusting fat orange pig
attributes.review:
THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!!!! First I see this fat orange Cheeto pig trying to flex it was just so disgusting. Then the fat Cheeto pig said I’m looking for a special someone out the of the ages 5-15 🤮. My little sister saw and became a zombie it was so disgusting (because it was so disgusting she died and came back to life) My mom saw it and thought her life was over. I have questions for you Trump supporters , how can you love a man so ignorant? He’s talking about he’s going to “make America great again” since when was America ever great? Maybe for the white people? Also how are you “making America great again” when he doesn’t even have that much self confidence? He really got upset because some teens on TikTok bought tons of his tickets and wasn’t even planing on going. See I can get why he’s disappointed but canceling it tho made him seem pathetic. How is the start of you “making America great again” separating children from there parents and cadging them, let alone throwing tear gas at them. He claims GOD but does he really believe in him?  Calling coronavirus the Chinese disease, just because it started in China doesn’t mean all people who are Chinese have and that goes to anybody else. Plus Trump could have the virus himself just because he says he doesn’t does not mean he doesn’t have it.                                        

THIS IS FOR YOU DONALD YOU BIG FAT UGLY CHEETO ORANGE NASTY SMELLING B***H WHY YOU TRY TO KICK ME OUT THE MOTHER F**KING COUNTRY WITH YO TRIFLING DIRTY RACIST ORANGE A** YOU BIG FAT B***H OOMPA LOOMPA BODY A** B***H
